definition: Gini coefficient (a measure of statistical dispersion)
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Angola has one of the worst Gini coefficients in the world.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉是世界上基尼係數最不容樂觀的國家之一。

sentences.english: The Gini coefficient measures the degree of polarisation of wealth and income in any given society.
sentences.chinese: 基尼係數衡量一個給定社會財富及收入兩級化的程度。

sentences.english: Here's the OECD's graph of Gini coefficients by country.
sentences.chinese: 下圖是經合組織按照國家排序的基尼係數。
